title: Quiz
errorQuizNotFound: Sorry {{participantName}}, no quiz for id {{quizId}} found
errorQuizIdNotValid: Sorry {{participantName}}, '{{quizId}}' is not a valid quiz id
hintRevealNotAllowed: If checked, other participants can see your answer when the quiz master reveals them
errorEstimation: Something went wrong. Please send the data again.
answerStatisticAllowedAnswer: {{participantName}} has answered '{{answer}}' after {{time}} seconds and it was {{rating}}
answerStatisticWithoutAnswer: {{participantName}} has answered after {{time}} seconds and it was {{rating}}
buzzerStatistic: {{participantName}} has buzzered after {{time}} seconds and it was {{rating}}
footerQuestion: You don't just want to take part, you want to organize a quiz yourself?
